ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Reminder - Possible Quenos Hills event!
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess you noticed no one cares about your maybe event. So just stop the spam. For the love of god, you are talking about a maybe event and if you can do
ygData.messageBody:
I guess you noticed no one cares about your "maybe" event. So just stop the
spam.

For the love of god, you are talking about a maybe event and if you can do
this and this, an event might happen and only happen on one server. ONE
SERVER !

Here is a hint, go spam your sever message board. Believe me, you'll get a
lot more feedback there.

-----Original Message-----
From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com [SMTP:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com]
Sent: Thursday, March 21, 2002 2:03 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Reminder - Possible Quenos Hills event!

------------------------ Yahoo! Groups Sponsor


We would like to remind you of this upcoming event.

Possible Quenos Hills event!

Date: Thursday, March 28, 2002
Time: All Day

Possible event in Quenos Hills if someone finds Vannaydar and
shows him to Cenadorm in the Quenos area!! (Veeshan server)

p.s.You get alot of bang from your buck show Vannaydar to
Cenadorm and he will give you 1,000pp!!





Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com


Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
